title: How to remove facial hair and have pure, radiant skin with the Braun Face

asset.author: Braun
asset.hookText:
Discover how to remove facial hair with precision and easier than ever and how to more effectively, yet gently cleanse your face.
Braun Face, the world’s first facial epilator and cleansing brush, lets you enjoy two treatments with one device - simply switch attachments.
Precisely remove facial hair by the root with the facial epilator or cleanse skin pore deep with the facial brush, 6x better than with your hands alone.
